marklogic.body: Re "But if you’re planning to travel south on one of Lubow’s charters, be prepared to invest some time. The buses leave for 7 p.m. games at least two hours before the first pitch, and some won’t return home until after midnight." Anyone leaving from the north say West Palm will be driving at the same speed and take the same time as the bus ..Everyone will be investing ,our customers just won't have to deal with the Headache. Conversely a game starting at 7 ending at 10 an average game length, 90% of the customers will be home well before midnight..sure PSL will be a longer ride to and fro but that is not unique to the bus as the article seems to indicate. It is the same commute / time for everyone. It just Depends where you live. And finally we are trying to find a way to lower the prices even more so that for the bronze level games from Broward for example the ride and ticket will be under $50 bucks.That's arguably a lot less than driving, gas and parking and less stressful for sure. The full link to see what the bus is all about is htpp://www.Ballgameexpress.
